order by ${orderByClause}

update tb_material_apply set apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apply_amount = #{applyAmount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, stock_amount = #{stockAmount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, arrival_time = #{arrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auditing_status = #{auditingStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, material_status = #{materialStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vehicle_id = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parts_type = #{partsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parts_id = #{partsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, factory_area_id = #{factoryAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, repair_id = #{repairId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: a.id, a.apply_time applyTime, a.apply_amount applyAmount, b.`name` organizationName, c.id workerId, c.user_name workerName, d.id vehicleId, d.vehicle_no vehicleNo, e.id materialId, e.material_no materialNo, e.material_name materialName, e.head_img_url materialImg
mapper.select: select count(1) FROM tb_material_apply a LEFT JOIN tb_organization b ON a.organization_id = b.id LEFT JOIN tb_user c ON a.user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN tb_vehicle d ON a.vehicle_id = d.id LEFT JOIN tb_components_parts e ON e.id = a.parts_id where a.organization_id = #{organizationId}
